subject: Basketball
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: The response from the stands during the Knicks’ first night at Madison Square Garden in six months showed that the public is not yet sure what to make of the team in the wake of a recent sexual harassment trial.
snippet: The response from the stands during the Knicks’ first night at Madison Square Garden in six months showed that the public is not yet sure what to make of the team in the wake of a recent sexual harassment trial.
